system.description: Gem dragons ensure their agents’ missions go undetected by bestowing upon them subterfuge magic. You know the message cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast illusory script once per long rest. At 5th level, you can cast invisibility once per long rest. You don’t need material components for these spells, and when casting them your spellcasting ability is Intelligence or Charisma (whichever is highest).
